name: MD-400D Marlin 0.4 nozzle
machine_end_gcode:
G91; relative positioning
G1 Z1.0 F3000 ; move z up little to prevent scratching of print
G90; absolute positioning
G28 X F1000 ; prepare for part removal
M104 S0; turn off extruder
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M84 ; disable motors
M106 S0 ; turn off fan
machine_start_gcode:
M220 S100 ;Reset Feedrate 
M221 S100 ;Reset Flowrate 
{if first_layer_temperature[0] > 0 and (is_extruder_used[0])}M104 T0 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}{endif}
{if first_layer_temperature[1] > 0 and (is_extruder_used[1])}M104 T1 S{first_layer_temperature[1]}{endif} 
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ;Wait for bed temp to stabilize 
G28 ;Home 
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ;Wait for bed temp to stabilize 
{if first_layer_temperature[1] > 0 and (is_extruder_used[1])}
T1
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder 
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up 
M104 S{first_layer_temperature[1]} ;Set final nozzle temp 
G1 X250 Y20 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to start position 
M109 S{first_layer_temperature[1]} ;Wait for nozzle temp to stabilize 
G1 X350 Y20.0 Z0.28 F1500.0 E30 ;Draw the first line 
G92 E0  ;Reset Extruder 
G1 E-1.0000 F1800 ;Retract a bit 
{endif}
{if first_layer_temperature[0] > 0 and (is_extruder_used[0])}
M104 S0 T1
T0
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder 
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up 
M104 S{first_layer_temperature[0]} ;Set final nozzle temp 
G1 X100 Y20 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to start position 
M109 S{first_layer_temperature[0]};Wait for nozzle temp to stabilize 
G1 X200 Y20.0 Z0.28 F1500.0 E30 ;Draw the first line 
G92 E0  ;Reset Extruder 
G1 E-1.0000 F1800 ;Retract a bit 
{endif}
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up 
G1 E0.0000 F1800
